# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  SCHEMATIC1.net exclude pwl_sources.cir tags pwl_sources.cir.hspice pwl_sources.cir.sh DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/pwl_sources.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/PWL_SOURCES/pwl_sources.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} pwl_sources.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} pwl_sources.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/PWL_SOURCES/pwl_sources.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/PWL_SOURCES/pwl_sources.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/pwl_sources.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/PWL_SOURCES/pwl_sources.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;hspice")
endif()
